attributes.action: Take note of the person who is dissabled in a way that is not the obvious...create some kind of financial support.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is not enough financial support for able working but 'dissabled' persons.Sign to make a change for them to live in society, there is support for parents with children so why shouldnt they get more help?

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
